A simpler block that utilizes the prospects of the &4Corporea Network&0 is the &1Corporea Funnel&0.
When given access to a network through a $(l:1_items/spark)&1Croporea Spark&0$(/l) on top, it'll pull a single item from the network when given a redstone signal.
This item is put into an inventory 1 or 2 blocks below it.

In case one doesn't exist or is full, the item is tossed into the world right above the funnel.
The &1Corporea Funnel&0 may only pull items that match its filter, similarly to a &1Hopperhock&0, the filter is designated by items contained on &1Item Frames&0 placed on it.
The item pulled is one of the various items in the frames at random.
Rotating the item changes how many will be requested at once, starting at 1, rotating will pull 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 48, and finally 64 items, respectively.
